text: Das schwarze Schaf is a 1944 German/Czechoslovak film, directed by Miroslav Cikán. It stars Victor Janson, Albert Johannes, and Lotte Koch. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1944 films Category:Czechoslovak films Category:German films Category:Films of Nazi Germany Category:German-language films Category:Films directed by Miroslav Cikán Category:Czech films Category:German black-and-white films Category:Czechoslovak black-and-white films
title: Das schwarze Schaf (1944 film)
